lyrics.stanza: Therefore being justified by faith We have peace with God Through our Lord Jesus Christ
Because the love of God is shed abroad In our hearts, by the Holy Spirit Which is given, which is given Unto us, to us, to us.
God hath commended His love toward us In that while we were yet sinners Christ died for us.
